#summary API Margins
#labels API

= Margins =

|| Protocol || HTTP ||
|| Data || JSON ||

Both [API_Project Project] and [API_Group Group] may have a margins property.

This JSON fragment is a field in Project or Group.

{{{
  "margins": "20px"
}}}

This value is the [http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/box.html#margin-properties CSS property "margin"] for the embedded HTML page.

When not found in Project, the field in Group will be used.
